name: Beer Me! (MarkMyWords)
description:
Made in ~2h 54m

Throw a beer to your friend. He isn't going to try and catch it, so you have to be pretty accurate and throw it at his arms.

  • Left-Click to start a throw
  • Drag your mouse to set the throw angle and strength
  • Release Left-Click to throw

I was going to make the friend move around after each time you landed a throw. You could just keep trying to throw cans at him until some time was up, but I didn't make the time to do it.

Pre-made Assets Used:

  • Kenney's Food Kit
  • Kenney's Furnature Kit
  • Kenney's Character Kit
